function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limits on research approaches during the pandemic may result in important gaps in knowledge generation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Direct applicability of the paper may be limited due to the pandemic situation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enduring relevance of the considerations in the paper for energy social science and research practices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential limited effectiveness of a single intervention in reducing virus transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing optimal mitigation policies to reduce peak healthcare demand and deaths.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelming health systems due to high transmission rates and uncontrolled epidemic growth.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 due to ineffective suppression measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on health systems due to school and university closures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term feasibility and sustainability of suppression measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmissibility rebounded once controls were lifted, leading to a resurgence of cases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged maintenance of non-pharmaceutical interventions npis and drugs until a vaccine is available.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Building population immunity through epidemic without interrupting transmission completely.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in people’s response to npis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High social and economic costs of suppression strategy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-resolution population density data used to define areas, potentially leading to high population density contact points","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of per-capita contacts within schools being double those elsewhere, potentially leading to higher transmission rates in schools","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of 5.1-day incubation period, potentially affecting the timing of disease control measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variable infectiousness due to gamma distribution assumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Under-ascertainment of infections 40-50%","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of short-term immunity after recovery","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"30% of hospitalised cases requiring critical care","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overall mean duration of hospitalisation of 10.4 days","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ifr estimates at 0.9% 95% credible interval 0.4%-1.4%","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementation of interventions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumptions leading to underestimation of risks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unmitigated epidemic with predicted deaths","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relatively little impact of stopping mass gatherings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of control measures without overwhelming healthcare systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in initiating social distancing and closure of schools and universities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the reproduction number r0 and severity of the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged implementation of social distancing measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population-wide social distancing measures may be socially disruptive and challenging to implement.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relaxation of social distancing measures may lead to a resurgence of transmission and new waves of infection.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large stocks of vaccine not available for 18 months or more","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large uncertainties around transmission of the virus and policy effectiveness","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spontaneous adoption of risk-reducing behaviors uncertain","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evolution of measures for suppression may lead to decreased efficiency of containment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns regarding mobile phone tracking apps may hinder policy effectiveness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective epidemic suppression due to school and university closures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Timing of interventions for mitigation and suppression strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in seeing the impact of interventions on hospitalised case numbers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social and economic effects of epidemic suppression measures will be profound","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty of long-term success of epidemic suppression strategy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assuming that each intervention has the same effect on the reproduction number across countries and over time.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on data from countries with more advanced epidemics and earlier interventions, such as italy and spain.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High level of uncertainty in estimating the effective reproduction number, rt, in italy around the time of lockdown.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wide credible interval estimates for the reproduction number","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large epidemics of covid-19 in europe","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
